channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shardlake
channel.desc: Compelling whodunnit series. The investigation intensifies as suspicion arises amongst the monks, and Barak is frustrated while following the trail of the monastery's accounts. S1 Ep2.

channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Litvinenko
channel.desc: This documentary reveals the untold story of the people behind the scenes who dealt with a deadly radioactive poisoning and the investigation into Alexander Litvinenko's murder.
